name: Five Nights At Meme Metropolis
description:
THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!!!

EXPECT BUGS AND GLITCHES!!! (and some fun gameplay loops as well)

also note that the characters will not appear in the doorways cause the game is broken lol

Description:

Five Nights at Meme Metropolis is a fangame based on Scott Cawthon's Five Nights at Freddy's, where you have to survive while being hunted down by bloodthirsty animatronic meme characters. This horrible idea of a game was constructed by my friend Elyas. I am a Scratch coder, mainly because I don't want to learn any other sorts of coding, so I like to make high-quality games and projects in Scratch.

Some Instructions:

While facing the office, move your mouse to the bottom of the screen to check the cameras. Move the mouse down again to close the cameras.

When facing the office, move your mouse to the top of the screen to look at the vents behind you. Be careful to watch the among us plushie closely, because it may move when you aren't looking.

please donate (i need to buy a nagito x sans pillow)
